= Differences from Original Plugin ==

= Installation ==
 * download from stable [http://code.google.com/p/bastmush/source/browse/branches/stable/lua/class.lua here] (make a note of the revision, it will help troubleshoot) or checkout with subversion and copy into the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\lua
